Sentencas: New types of La0.8Sr0.2Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-delta (LSCM) perovskite composites with the addition of copper(Cu), XCu (X = 25, 35 and 45%) as forming additive, were synthesized via the sol-gel method as alternative anodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) and characterized by several techniques.
Titulo: Impregnation of La0.3Sr0.2Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ+ Cu perovskite as the anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: Phase formation of the LSCM-Cu cermets was confirmed by X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Impregnation of La0.3Sr0.2Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ+ Cu perovskite as the anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: Electrical conductivity was obtained from room temperature to 800 degrees C, indicating the presence of two types of behaviors: both semiconductor and metal.
Titulo: Impregnation of La0.3Sr0.2Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ+ Cu perovskite as the anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: When the concentration of Cu was 25 and 35%, the dominant behavior was the semiconductor type.
Titulo: Impregnation of La0.3Sr0.2Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ+ Cu perovskite as the anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: The thermal expansion coefficient (TEC) determined was linearly inversely proportional to the concentration of Cu.
Titulo: Impregnation of La0.3Sr0.2Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ+ Cu perovskite as the anode for SOFCs

Sentencas: The results of electrical conductivity, TEC, and morphological analysis suggested that the anodes with 25 and 35% Cu are most suitable for use in the IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Impregnation of La0.3Sr0.2Cr0.5Mn0.5O3-δ+ Cu perovskite as the anode for SOFCs
